solution:
```python
def flood_damage(s):
    n = len(s)
    water_level = 0
    floods = []
    total_area = 0
    i = 0
    while i < n:
        if s[i] == '/':
            water_level += 1
        elif s[i] == '\\':
            water_level -= 1
            if water_level < 0:
                floods.append(-water_level)
                total_area += -water_level
                water_level = 0
        elif s[i] == '_':
            if water_level > 0:
                floods.append(water_level)
                total_area += water_level
                water_level = 0
        i += 1
    print(total_area)
    print(len(floods), end=' ')
    for area in floods:
        print(area, end=' ')
    print()

flood_damage("\\//")
flood_damage("\\///\\/_/\\\\/_/\\///__\\\\_\\\\/_/\\/_/")
```
